Description: Pottery ostracon, convex, from the shoulder of a grooved vessel, with part of two lines of an incised inscription - Coptic.
Curator's comments: To be published by J. Cromwell & J. Faiers
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394053) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394053)
